title: Model fails to train when project name starts with a dash (-) or underscore (_)
body: **Describe the bug** After starting a new project and naming it with a starting underscore (or dash), the model fails to train / finish training. The front end just shows as if the model is being trained (see screenshot below). As I run `asreview lab` in the development environment, I noticed curious terminal output for the back end as well - the project was recognised as "-baseline" for I had named it "_baseline" (check CLI output below.) Also, when removing the project via front end, I am required to input the name "-baseline" in order to confirm the deletion (see screenshot below). _To verify the input data set ([_baseline.ris.zip](https://github.com/asreview/asreview/files/6960558/_baseline.ris.zip)), I imported the same file into a new project named "baseline" and the model trained successfully._ **To Reproduce** 1. `asreview lab` to start the back end application (in development mode) 2. `npm start` to start the front end application (in development mode) 3. In the GUI, hover over the "+" button 4. While hovering over the "+" button, select "New project" 5. Fill mandatory field "Project name" with input "_baseline" 6. Click "Create" 7. Click "START SETUP" 8. Drag input (check above for the attached archive) file into the "FROM FILE" import method 9. Click "UPLOAD" 10. Click "NEXT" 11. Click "RANDOM" for selecting (ir)relevant documents 12. Click three times on "IRRELEVANT" to select three random records 13. Click three times on "RELEVANT" to select three random records 14. Close the "Prior Knowledge..." window by clicking on the X 15. Click "NEXT" 16. Click "FINISH" 17. Wait for the model training to finish **Screenshots** - Model training: - Project deletion: **Version information** - OS: MacOS Big Sur 11.5.1 (20G80) - `% asreview --version 0.17+114.g60a7c7a.dirty` **Additional context** ```INFO:werkzeug:127.0.0.1 - - [10/Aug/2021 11:09:36] "GET /boot HTTP/1.1" 200 - INFO:root:Project found: baseline INFO:werkzeug:127.0.0.1 - - [10/Aug/2021 11:09:36] "GET /api/projects HTTP/1.1" 200 - INFO:werkzeug:127.0.0.1 - - [10/Aug/2021 11:10:28] "POST /api/project/info HTTP/1.1" 201 - INFO:werkzeug:127.0.0.1 - - [10/Aug/2021 11:10:29] "GET /api/project/-baseline/info HTTP/1.1" 200 - INFO:werkzeug:127.0.0.1 - - [10/Aug/2021 11:11:00] "GET /api/project/-baseline/info HTTP/1.1" 200 - DEBUG:root:Project -baseline - Acquired lock active WARNING:root:Expected start tag in line 0: ï»¿TY - JOUR INFO:root:Store a copy of the data in a pickle file. DEBUG:root:Project -baseline - Released lock active INFO:werkzeug:127.0.0.1 - - [10/Aug/2021 11:12:13] "POST /api/project/-baseline/data HTTP/1.1" 200 - INFO:werkzeug:127.0.0.1 - - [10/Aug/2021 11:12:13] "GET /api/project/-baseline/data HTTP/1.1" 200 - DEBUG:root:Project -baseline - Acquired lock active DEBUG:root:Project -baseline - Released lock active INFO:werkzeug:127.0.0.1 - - [10/Aug/2021 11:12:28] "GET /api/project/-baseline/prior_stats HTTP/1.1" 200 - DEBUG:root:Project -baseline - Acquired lock active DEBUG:root:Project -baseline - Released lock active INFO:werkzeug:127.0.0.1 - - [10/Aug/2021 11:12:53] "GET /api/project/-baseline/prior_random HTTP/1.1" 200 -
